nodes.text: Person X and person Y have had conversations
There are links between persons X and person Y
Person X and person Y possess documents about the same islamic group
Person X and person Y travel from point P1 to point P2
Person X and person Y follow the same route
If two persons have had conversations, then there are links between them
If two persons possess documents about the same islamic group, then there are links between them
If two persons travel from the same points P1 and P2 then they followed the same route
If two persons followed the same route, then there are links between them

CQ: Do they really posses islamic documents?
Is there any other evidence that links these two individuals?
Is the possesion of islamic documents enough to infer links between them?
Isn't there a different route that passes through these two points?
Is there indisputable evidence that they actually travelled from these two points?
Did they really follow the same route?

Is the fact that they followed the same route enough to infer links between them?
